name: Oil
detail: Leather flask containing lantern Oil (+1 oil)

name: Brew of lesser DMG
detail: Drink to gain +1 Dmg to your next damage roll

name: Brew of lesser STR
detail: Drink to gain +3 Str to your next D100 dice roll

name: Brew of lesser DEX
detail: Drink to gain +3 Dex to your next D100 dice roll

name: Brew of lesser INT
detail: Drink to gain +3 Int to your next d100 dice roll.

name: Brew of lesser DEF
detail: Drink to gain +1 Def on a monsters next damage roll

name: Potion of lesser remove poison
detail: Drink to remove up to 2 shaded pips on the poison track

name: Potion of lesser healing
detail: Drink to restore up to 4 lost HP

name: Potion of lesser STR
detail: Drink to gain +3 Str until you next shade a 🕐 on the time track

name: Potion of lesser DEX
detail: Drink to gain +3 Dex until you next shade a 🕐 on the time track

name: Potion of lesser INT
detail: Drink to gain +3 Int until you next shade a 🕐 on the time track

name: Potion of lesser cure disease
detail: Drink to remove up to 2 shaded pips on the disease track

name: Scroll of open magic
detail: Use once to make a CAST SCROLL test to attempt to open magic doors

name: Potion of lesser fate
detail: Drink to add +20 to a result when rolling on the next table

name: Scroll of resurrection
detail: See spells, it has a value of 1500gp to buy and 200gp when selling
